DOC.brief_summary: After general anesthesia , risk airway obstruction , hypoventilation , atelectasis , ventilation-perfusion mismatch , hypercarbia hypoxemia , oxygen supplement PACU seem necessary . This study aim compare two method oxygen supplement 1.nasal cannula O2 flow 4 L/min . 2.oxygen mask O2 flow 5 L/min . The hypothesis study 2 method equally provide effective oxygen supplement prevent anesthesia-related hypoxemia . Choosing nasal cannula would reasonable cheap comfortable patient .
DOC.brief_title: The Performance Two Oxygen Delivery Devices Used After General Anesthesia .
DOC.detailed_description: The incidence cause hypoxemia PACU identify , necessary , high flow change oxygen delivery system use prevent treat hypoxemia . If patient fail oxygen wean protocol PACU need longer oxygen therapy ward , duration oxygen therapy record also compliance oxygen delivery device .
DOC.criteria: General anesthesia Age 1870 year American Society Anesthesiology ( ASA ) physical status 13 Elective case ASA physical status class 4 Unstable pulmonary disease BMI > 35 kg/m2 oxygen saturation < 94 % breathing room air Respiratory muscle weakness eg.myasthenia gravis Central nervous system abnormality eg.drowsiness , hypoventilation Patients intubate needed ventilatory support operation Plan remain intubated operation Intracranial , intrathoracic upper abdomen surgery Patients nasogastric tube insert Airway problem eg . sinusitis Nasal cavity relate surgery nasal pack eg . endoscopic sinus surgery Patient refusal
